SEARCH
Package com.dimon.utils

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.dimon.utils.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for UDP communication. Includes methods for converting data formats, creating protocol messages, and managing message-related operations such as CRC calculations and sequence handling.

      flag - a flag indicating additional metadata.

      Returns:
      the created CONFIRMATION message.

    • sendFile

      public static MyUDPProtocol sendFile(MyUDPProtocol received, DataFile file, int seqNumberCounter, short windowSize)
      Creates a SEND FILE message for file transfer.
      Parameters:
      received - the previously received protocol for context.
      file - the file to be sent.
      seqNumberCounter - the sequence number of the file fragment.
      Returns:
      a `MyUDPProtocol` object representing the SEND FILE message.

    • sendFinalMessage

      public static MyUDPProtocol sendFinalMessage(MyUDPProtocol receiver, boolean isFile, short windowSize)
      Creates a FINISH message to signify the end of communication.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the previously received protocol for context.
      isFile - whether the communication was related to a file transfer.
      Returns:
      a `MyUDPProtocol` object representing the FINISH message.

    • resendMessage

      public static MyUDPProtocol resendMessage(MyUDPProtocol receiver)
      Creates a RESEND message in case of CRC mismatch or lost packets.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the protocol to base the resend request on.
      Returns:
      a `MyUDPProtocol` object representing the RESEND message.

      Parameters:
      prev - the previous protocol message, if available.
      Returns:
      a `MyUDPProtocol` object representing the KEEP ALIVE message.
